title: "Frequency and Wavelength Relative Periodicity"
output:
  github_document: default
---

## Chord

```{r, echo=F, results='asis', message=F}
devtools::load_all('.')
chord = c(12,19) %>% mami.codi(
  frequency_tolerance  = TOLERANCE,
  wavelength_tolerance = TOLERANCE,
  verbose=T,
  num_harmonics=6
)
knitr::kable(tibble::tibble(
 f=chord$frequencies[[1]],
 l=chord$wavelengths[[1]]
))
```

### Cycles Estimates

#### Spatial Estimate
```{r, echo=F, results='asis', message=F}
knitr::kable(tibble::tibble(
  min    = min(chord$wavelengths[[1]]),
  lcd    = chord$wavelength_lcd,
  something_wavelength = min / lcd,
  something_period     = something_wavelength / SPEED_OF_SOUND
))
```

#### Temporal Estimate
```{r, echo=F, results='asis', message=F}
knitr::kable(tibble::tibble(
  min    = min(chord$frequencies[[1]]),
  lcd    = chord$frequency_lcd,
  envelope_frequency = min / lcd,
  envelope_period    = 1 / envelope_frequency
))
```

### Frequency Ratios
```{r, echo=F, results='asis', message=F}
knitr::kable(chord$frequency_ratios[[1]] %>% dplyr::arrange(ratio) %>% dplyr::select(-pseudo_ratio))
```

### Wavelength Ratios
```{r, echo=F, results='asis', message=F}
knitr::kable(chord$wavelength_ratios[[1]] %>% dplyr::arrange(ratio) %>% dplyr::select(-pseudo_ratio))
```
